content: Hospital in SingaporeHospital in Singapore , Singapore The **Yishun Community Hospital** ([Abbreviation](/wiki/Abbreviation): **YCH**) is a 428-bed [community hospital](/wiki/Community_hospital) in [Yishun](/wiki/Yishun), Singapore. It is part of an integrated healthcare development that includes the [Khoo Teck Puat Hospital](/wiki/Khoo_Teck_Puat_Hospital) (abbreviated to KTPH). - Yishun Community Hospital This article about a hospital in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Yishun Community Hospital
